# ThreadSanitizer suppressions for DELILA2
# ZeroMQ is known to have false positives with TSan due to its internal threading model

# Suppress data races reported in ZeroMQ library
race:libzmq.so
race:zmq_*
race:zmq::*

# Suppress races in ZeroMQ's internal I/O threads
thread:ZMQbg/IO

# Suppress standard library related false positives
race:std::basic_streambuf
